explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the play, specifically a corner of greenery in the countryside where Noellie is sleeping on a grass bench next to her guitar. This fits the definition of the 'setting' category, as it outlines the location and context of the scene.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente un coin de verdure, dans la campagne, Noellie est endormie sur un banc de gazon, à côté de sa guitare.
